message.body: Are we still on for Anne's studio tour tomorrow morning?
Hmm. I told Michael about it and he said there's supposed to be lots of snow tomorrow, esp in the morning. Are you going to the show Anne curated's opening reception tonight?
I'm going to Zoe Strauss reception but maybe I can make Anne's too
They always exaggerate snow so yup I was going to/ want to get picked up tom morning?
you have a car now? that would be great, but i don’t want you to have to drive all the way up to temple campus! i can meet you somewhere closer if that’s easier.
Yup! It would be my pleasure, don't worry. What is your address? I'll be there at 8:30am
Of course! Here but take your time. I'm early.
I'll eat my cereal super fast!
Lol take your time!!! Do you have coffee?! Lol bring me some
I drove around your campus trying to find coffee for 30 min and I finally gave up
I can make some but we only have shitty folgers - there's a coffee place that's open, just only accessible on foot. Sorry about that!!
Our friendship is OVER! Lol no worries. We will find some on way.
